alert.note: Alert for Le Sueur; Rice; Steele; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:57PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Le Sueur, northwestern Steele, northern Waseca and Rice Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waterville, or 15 miles west of Faribault, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Morristown and Warsaw around 1210 AM CDT. Faribault around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Medford and Owatonna. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 37 and 66. U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 144 and 156, and between mile markers 160 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Minnesota.
